name: Bathyal Bounty
description:
The deep sea holds untold mysteries - and bounty. 

Navigate your submarine through a cave system in the blackness of the bathyal zone and use your sonar to find precious artifacts. But beware, your supply of oxygen is limited and the caves are narrow and dangerous...

How to play

- Press the left mouse button to accelerate towards your cursor

- Press the right mouse button to decelerate

- Collect Artifacts for Points

- Press space to activate your sonar, which will show you the directions of the remaining artifacts

- Ascend to a depth of 1000 to end the game

- You will receive bonus points for your remaining hull and air, so be quick but careful!

- Press Escape to close this screen

- Press F3 to reset the game
